main.head: Silvio Berlusconi 'advises on Milan team selection' – video
main.p: This article is more than 12 years old

Milan manager Massimiliano Allegri says he has two phone calls a week with club president Silvio Berlusconi, during which the former Italian prime minister gives his thoughts on team selection and strategy. Allegri says he takes Berlusconi's viewpoint on board as he has been involved with the club for 25 years, but the final say lies with the manager and coaching staff
